class.name: RobotiqHand
class.description: A Python plugin to monitor and control the 3 finger gripper from Robotiq

group.label: TUBAF
group.statustip: Plugins developed by the Mining-RoX project at the TU Bergakademie Freiberg, Germany.

group.statustip: A Python GUI plugin for monitoring and controlling the 3 finger gripper from Robotiq.
